extraDescription: The resource shall provide business analysis and support to the EI PMO as it relates to needs of the assigned EI Transformation projects.  - Facilitate workshops with key stakeholders to assess 'As Is' and 'To Be' states and high level business requirements; - Elicit business requirements using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, and other business analysis techniques, critically evaluate the information gathered, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level requirements into the detail required for implementation.
